title: Web-Development Study Tool - Group Project
technologiesUsed: HTML / CSS + Bootstrap / JavaScript / APIs / Github Branches
shortDescription: Our primary motivation was to provide an intuitive, visually clear and useful tool for students learning how to code. We perfected a Website using YouTube and Wikipedia APIs, to supply users with sufficient information to their queries.

title: React Portfolio
shortDescription: Welcome to Adrian's React Portfolio! This is a dynamic and interactive web application built using React.js, designed to showcase my skills, projects, and experiences in an elegant and engaging manner.

title: Team Profile Generator App
technologiesUsed: HTML / CSS + Bootstrap / JavaScript / Node.js / Jest / Inquirer
shortDescription: This command-line application generates HTML files based on input provided via a user interface. It is designed to help managers quickly generate a webpage displaying basic information about their team members, including their names, IDs, email addresses, and additional details such as GitHub usernames or schools for engineers and interns respectively.

title: Weather-Dashboard-App
technologiesUsed: HTML / CSS + Bootstrap / JavaScript + DayJS / jQuery / APIs
shortDescription: Weather Dashboard App, your go-to destination for real-time weather information and a 5-day forecast for any city worldwide! This Weather Dashboard App provides a reliable and visually appealing platform for all your weather-related needs.

title: Daily Planner App
technologiesUsed: HTML / CSS + Bootstrap / JavaScript + DayJS / jQuery
shortDescription: Organize your days effortlessly with this responsive and interactive planner, offering a seamless blend of user-friendly design and advanced functionality for a productive daily experience.

title: Random Password Generator
shortDescription: his project showcases a modern and responsive design, with interactive features powered by custom JavaScript functions. Explore the seamless blend of front-end technologies to create an engaging user experience.
